lines.text: You don't wanna change the world, do you, honey? You just wanna make love.
I only write what I feel.
I go out and make love to 25,000 people, and then I go home alone.
Our assignment - neutralize the three pied pipers of rock music.
I look for rainbows, and all I see is pig blue.
I know I didn't need that second barrel, but who counts birdshot in a man's chest? Rock and roll is dead. Long live rock and roll!
